mapper.update: UPDATE goodsfacility SET goodsfacility_state_afterservice = '배송준비중' ,goodsfacility_is_possible_rental = 'N' WHERE goodsfacility_code = #{goodsfacilityCode}
UPDATE delivery_order_citizen SET is_functionary_accept_order = 'Y' WHERE delivery_order_citizen_code = #{deliveryOrderCitizenCode}
mapper.select: SELECT agen.agency_name AS agencyName ,agenbusin.agency_businesstype_name AS agencyBusinesstypeName FROM agency AS agen INNER JOIN agency_businesstype AS agenbusin ON agen.agency_businesstype_code = agenbusin.agency_businesstype_code WHERE agen.adminagency_code = #{adminagencyCode} AND agenbusin.agency_businesstype_name = '배달'
